item.description:
Impetus Warbook 2 includes 95 army lists for Impetus second edition.

VOLUME 7: ROME AND THE EMPIRE
Early Roxolani Sarmatians (310 BC-99 AD), Nabataean Kingdom (312 BC-106 AD), Pre-Islamic Arabs (300 BC-633 AD), Kushan (135 BC-270 AD), Early Germans (100 BC-240 AD), Dacians (60 BC-318 AD), Ancient Britons (55 BC-75 AD), Later Parthian (53 BC-227 AD), Early Imperial Romans (29 BC-197 AD), Moors (25-696 AD), Alans (50-1307 AD), Jewish Revolt (66-135 AD), Caledonians (75-211 AD), Later Roxolani (100-400 AD) and other Sarmatians (310 BC-400 AD), Kingdom of Axum (100-960 AD)

VOLUME 8: ROME CRISIS AND FALL
Middle Imperial Romans (197-284 AD), Early Visigoths or Thervingi (200-419 AD) or Early Vandals (200-442 AD), Early Ostrogoths (200-493 AD), Early Sassanid Persians (224-532 AD), Alamanni (241-506 AD), Later Germans (241-495AD), Early Frankish (241-496 AD), Palmyra (260-273 AD), Later Imperial Romans (West) (285-409 AD), Later Imperial Romans (East) (285-378 AD), Later Armenian (252-627 AD), Huns (356-570 AD), Patrician Romans (409-476 AD West) (378-493 AD East), Middle Visigothic (419-478 AD), Later Visigothic (479-711 AD), Early Merovingians (481-714 AD)

VOLUME 9: BRITANNIA
Picts (Cruithni) (211 BC-842 AD), Scots-Irish (50 BC-841 AD), Early Post Roman British (407-537AD), Early Anglo-Saxons 442-660 AD, Later Post Roman British (538-1054 AD), Early Welsh (600-1100 AD)

VOLUME 10: ANCIENT FAR EAST
Shang Chinese (1600-1046 BC), Western Zhou (1045-771 BC), Yayoi Japanese (800 BC-250 AD), Eastern Zhou (770-481 BC), Early Warring States (480-355 BC), Later Warring States and Qin Empire (355-202 BC), Xiongnu (200 BC-216 AD), Western Han (206 BC-24 AD), Early Goguryeo Korean (37 BC-299 AD), Eastern Han (25-220 AD), Xianbei (93-430 AD), Three Kingdoms Wei (220-265 AD) & Shu Han (221-263 AD), Three Kingdoms Wu (229-280 AD), Yamato Japanese (251-793 AD), Later Goguryeo Korean (300-688 AD), Northern and Southern Dynasties (307-589 AD)

VOLUME 11: STEPPE PEOPLES
Central Asian Turkish (550-740 AD), Avars (553-826 AD), Khazars (650-965 AD), Magyars (650-997 AD), Uighurs (744-1330 AD), Khurasanian (820-1000 AD), Pechenegs (850-1122 AD)

VOLUME 12: ARMIES OF ISLAM
Arab Conquest (622-632 AD), Rashidun Arab (633-660 AD), Ummayyad Arab (661-750 AD), Early Abbasid Arab (750-835 AD), North African Dynasties (789-1148 AD), Later Abbasid Arab (836-945 AD), Daylami Dynasties (930-1090 AD)

VOLUME 13: JUSTINIAN AGE
African Vandal (442-535 AD), Early Lombards (490-584 AD), Early Byzantines (493-578 AD), Italian Ostrogoths (493-561 AD), Later Sassanid (531-627 AD)

VOLUME 14: AGE OF CHARLEMAGNE
Old Saxons & Bavarians (531-804 AD), Maurikian Byzantines (579-650 AD), Lombards in Italy (584-774 AD), Thematic Byzantine (651-962 AD), Later Anglo-Saxon (661-1016 AD), Bulgars (675-1237 AD), Early Andalusians (710-765 AD), Later Merovingian and Charles Martel Franks (715-768 AD), Charlemagne Franks (768-814 AD), Vikings (789-1071 AD), Rus (860-1054 AD)

VOLUME 15: YEAR 1000
Later Lombards (774-1053 AD), Norse Irish (840-1100 AD), Sicilian Arabs (878-1091 AD), Principality of Hungary (997-1099 AD), Pre Feudal French (898-1050 AD), Eastern Franks and Ottonians (898-1125 AD), Normans in Normandy (911-1072 AD), Nikephorian Byzantines (963-1042 AD), Anglo Danish (1014-1075 AD), Konstantinian Byzantines (1042-1071 AD), Early Feudal Papal States (1049-1085 AD), Normans in South Italy (1042-1139 AD)

—description from the publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
